net.minecraftforge.common.extensions

接口 IForgeFluidState

  • 所有已知子接口:
    IFluidState
    所有已知实现类:
    FluidState

    public interface IForgeFluidState

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 默认方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      default boolean canRenderInLayer(BlockRenderLayer layer)
      Queries if this fluidstate should render in a given layer.
      default float getExplosionResistance(IWorldReader world, BlockPos pos, Entity exploder, Explosion explosion)
      Location sensitive version of getExplosionResistance
      default IFluidState getFluidState() 
      default boolean isEntityInside(IWorldReader world, BlockPos pos, Entity entity, double yToTest, Tag<Fluid> tag, boolean testingHead)
      Called when the entity is inside this block, may be used to determined if the entity can breathing, display material overlays, or if the entity can swim inside a block.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getFluidState

        default IFluidState getFluidState()

      • isEntityInside

        default boolean isEntityInside(IWorldReader world,
                               BlockPos pos,
                               Entity entity,
                               double yToTest,
                               Tag<Fluid> tag,
                               boolean testingHead)
        Called when the entity is inside this block, may be used to determined if the entity can breathing, display material overlays, or if the entity can swim inside a block.
        参数:
        world - that is being tested.
        pos - position thats being tested.
        entity - that is being tested.
        yToTest, - primarily for testingHead, which sends the the eye level of the entity, other wise it sends a y that can be tested vs liquid height.
        material - to test for.
        testingHead - when true, its testing the entities head for vision, breathing ect... otherwise its testing the body, for swimming and movement adjustment.

      • getExplosionResistance

        default float getExplosionResistance(IWorldReader world,
                                     BlockPos pos,
                                     Entity exploder,
                                     Explosion explosion)
        Location sensitive version of getExplosionResistance
        参数:
        world - The current world
        pos - Block position in world
        exploder - The entity that caused the explosion, can be null
        explosion - The explosion
        返回:
        The amount of the explosion absorbed.

      • canRenderInLayer

        default boolean canRenderInLayer(BlockRenderLayer layer)
        Queries if this fluidstate should render in a given layer. A custom IBakedModel can use MinecraftForgeClient.getRenderLayer() to alter the model based on layer.
